title: A Parisian Brasserie With a Global Footprint Sets Up Shop in TriBeCa
description: A Ukrainian restaurant in the former Pegu Club space, a new look for the restaurant in Scandinavia House and more news.
dc:creator: Florence Fabricant
media:credit: Jeenah Moon for The New York Times
media:description: Brasserie Fouquet’s, on the ground floor of the Hotel Barrière Fouquet’s New York.
